items.name: Contract_Selector
items.label: انتخاب قرارداد/الحاقيه
items.sql:
SELECT NULL ID, ' قرارداد / الحاقيه را انتخاب كنيد ...' ID

UNION

SELECT Contract_Code, CONCAT (Contract_Code," || ",Contract_Title)
FROM PMT_TB110001
WHERE IsActive = 1
 and IsDelete = 0
 and Contract_Amendment = "@#Contract_Amendment"

items.name: Amendment_Selector
items.label: انتخاب قرارداد مربوط به الحاقيه
items.sql:
SELECT NULL ID, ' قرارداد مربوطه را انتخاب كنيد ...' ID

UNION

SELECT Contract_Code, CONCAT (Contract_Code," || ",Contract_Title)
FROM PMT_TB110001
WHERE IsActive = 1
 and IsDelete = 0
 and Contract_Amendment = 0

items.name: Contract_Code
items.label: كد قرارداد
items.sql:
SELECT Contract_Code
FROM PMT_TB110001
WHERE IsDelete = 0 and IsActive = 1 and Contract_Code = "@#Contract_Selector"

items.name: Contract_Title
items.label: عنوان قرارداد
